io.nem.symbol.core.crypto

Interface DsaSigner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ed25519DsaSigner

    public interface DsaSigner
    Interface that supports signing and verification of arbitrarily sized message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isCanonicalSignature(Signature signature)
      Determines if the signature is canonical.
      Signature makeSignatureCanonical(Signature signature)
      Makes this signature canonical.
      Signature sign(byte[] data)
      Signs the hash of an arbitrarily sized message.
      boolean verify(byte[] data, Signature signature)
      Verifies that the signature is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        Signature sign(byte[] data)
        Signs the hash of an arbitrarily sized message.
        Parameters:
        data - The message to sign.
        Returns:
        The generated signature.

      • verify

        boolean verify(byte[] data,
               Signature signature)
        Verifies that the signature is valid.
        Parameters:
        data - The original message.
        signature - The generated signature.
        Returns:
        true if the signature is valid.

      • isCanonicalSignature

        boolean isCanonicalSignature(Signature signature)
        Determines if the signature is canonical.
        Parameters:
        signature - The signature.
        Returns:
        true if the signature is canonical.

      • makeSignatureCanonical

        Signature makeSignatureCanonical(Signature signature)
        Makes this signature canonical.
        Parameters:
        signature - The signature.
        Returns:
        Signature in canonical form.
